channel.title: A good source to use? Look
channel.description:
I am wondering what is a good server-base (I don't care if its custom as long as it follows what features I want) to develop. I am planning to replicate Runescape 2 from the year 2007-08 or maybe earlier and I don't know what server base to use as I have not coded a Runescape 2 server is a long time.
Note - I currently develop Runescape Classic private servers so bare with me here.
I need a server that: -Has little or no custom features that Jagex did not implement into Runescape 2 -Works with a cache of at least 317 - 425 (or any cache that was used in 07-08 -Very Stable -Doesn't use mysql
Also, I don't care if the server is "hard to code" as I seen some people prefer Delta source over other sources due to it being "easy to code".
Any suggestions? Also I would appreciate links to threads of a base!

item.title: A good source to use? Look
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

Download a devo 7 source

Client: Blank 317 Deob

all links in server download secitons
